UNDER THE HOOD

Core Technology

Our software provides granular control over every aspect of your browser identity, engineered for stability and stealth.

Kernel Injection

We modify the Chromium engine at C++ level, not JavaScript injection which can be detected.

Deep Dive: Standard anti-detects use JS injection which leaves traces in the DOM. PrintGuard recompiles the browser engine to return spoofed values natively.

Native Noise

Canvas and Audio fingerprints are altered mathematically to produce unique, consistent hashes.

Deep Dive: We apply a unique noise algorithm that persists per session. Even if you refresh the page, your Canvas hash remains consistent but unique.

Font Enumeration

Custom font packing ensures your font list matches the spoofed OS exactly.

Deep Dive: If you spoof macOS on Windows, we hide system fonts like Calibri and inject San Francisco, passing advanced font enumeration tests.

Complete Fingerprint Control

Customize every single parameter that websites use to track you.

Hardware

  • CPU Concurrency
  • Device Memory (RAM)
  • Screen Resolution
  • Battery Status

  • DNS Leak Protection

Browser
